Episod kali ini kita bersama Takahara dengan topik janda diusia muda.

programme.title: Destinasi Bajet S5 Ep01
programme.desc: Dengan bajet yang minimum untuk penginapan, makan minum dan cenderahati untuk tiga hari dua malam ikuti pengembaraan cara destinasi bajet. Bersama Zetty Nabila, ikuti pemgembaraan ke Kuala Lumpur.

programme.title: Huru Hara S15 Ep10
programme.desc: Di hoskan oleh Anas Ridzuan, Huru Hara kali ini pasti membuatkan anda terhibur sambil bergelak ketawa. Dalam episod ini kita santai santai bersama barisan artis yang terdiri daripada Zynakal, Raf Yaakob, Amen Khalid dan Fahimi Rahmat..

programme.title: Homegrown Show S9 Ep04
programme.desc: Homegrown Show kini kembali, memaparkan persembahan muzik berlainan genre dari artis serta kugiran tanah air pada masa kini. Episod minggu ini bersama dengan Kapow..

programme.title: Aroma Masak S17 Ep07
programme.desc: Atoi selaku hos musim ini akan menyediakan 2 menu iaitu Nasi goreng butter dan tauhu sumbat sambil ditemani oleh artis jemputan, Anas Ridzuan.

programme.title: Mat Moto
programme.desc: Empat sekawan yang gemar akan motosikal menjelajah Malaysia sambil menerokai erti sebenar persahabatan.

programme.title: UC 2
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri yang bahagia mula mengalami mimpi ngeri di rumah mereka apabila perbuatan ghaib dan misteri mula berlaku.

programme.title: Hantu Bungkus VS Pontianak
programme.desc: Sebuah filem seram komedi lakonan Osman Kering, Rosli Rahman Adam, Fetty Dzul dan Emma Akma

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: Sekumpulan rakan mendedahkan objek dunia lain di padang luar bandar yang mereka temui menyimpan rahsia yang lebih besar daripada yang mereka bayangkan.

programme.title: Azem 4
programme.desc: Ilmu hitam yang canggih telah ditetas oleh seorang syeikh yang jahat dan seorang ibu yang kembali menziarahi anaknya dan isterinya. Tujuan ilmu hitam itu tidak ketara tetapi ia berakhir dengan jenayah yang dilakukan oleh isteri terhadap suaminya.

programme.title: Rumah Pasung
programme.desc: Ryan, Sultan dan Mayang merupakan krew program tv tersebut. Suatu hari Ryan terpaksa menghadiri pengebumian bapa kandungnya. Ibu bapa Ryan membongkar masa lalu Ryan. Ryan anak angkat. Ayah Ryan meninggalkan sebuah rumah untuknya.

programme.title: Nak Dengar Cerita Hantu Ep 7 Ep7
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang lelaki yang menerima patung wayang kulit dari ayahnya kononnya untuk menjaga dia di perantauan. Namun apa yang dia tak tahu patung tersebut mempunyai penjaganya sendiri iaitu hantu pak dogol. Untuk melepaskan diri dari Hantu pak dogol dia harus menjalani beberapa ritual apatah lagi dia melanggar pantang dengan berkahwin dengan gadis yang bukan satu keturunan.

programme.title: Taxi 2
programme.desc: Duta Jepun sedang melawat Marseilles untuk melihat taktik anti-geng polis bandar. Semasa lawatan itu, bagaimanapun, dia diculik oleh kumpulan yang bekerja untuk yakuza Jepun. Pegawai muda Emilien berazam untuk menyelamatkan duta dan pegawai Petra (teman wanitanya), yang turut diculik, dan memulihkan kehormatan jabatannya. Sekali lagi, pemandu teksi syaitan laju Daniel (dari filem Teksi pertama) dipanggil untuk menyelamatkan hari dengan kemahiran memandu lajunya.

programme.title: The Invoking 3
programme.desc: Beratus-ratus kejadian paranormal yang mengganggu berlaku setiap tahun. Kebanyakan pertemuan yang menakutkan ini tidak dilaporkan--sehingga kini. Masuk ke dunia yang membimbangkan "Invoking 3: Paranormal Dimensions," di mana mayat hidup datang untuk mendatangkan malapetaka kepada yang masih hidup. Grim Reapers, poltergeists jahat, kuasa syaitan dan roh yang disihir akan menghilangkan ketakutan anda dan mengheret anda ke dalam jurang mimpi buruk yang terjaga.

programme.title: Ong Bak 3
programme.desc: Kisah pahlawan Tien, yang telah ditangkap oleh panglima perang yang kejam Tuan Rajasena. Tien melarikan diri daripada cengkaman Rajasena, pulih daripada kecederaannya yang melumpuhkan dengan bantuan Guru Bua, dan kembali untuk berhadapan dengan Bhuti Sangkha, yang telah menggantikan Rajasena sebagai penjahat utama.

programme.title: Taxi 5
programme.desc: Seorang pegawai polis yang ditukarkan dalam polis Marseilles ditugaskan untuk menumpaskan sekumpulan perompak Itali yang memandu Ferrari berkuasa bersama anak saudara Daniel yang lebih tua, seorang pemandu yang teruk yang mendapat teksi putih legenda.

programme.title: Takut Ke Tak
programme.desc: Lima pelajar jurusan filem merancang untuk melakukan penggambaran di sebuah rumah berhantu, namun satu demi satu kejadian yang sama seperti kebanyakan filem seram berlaku kepada mereka lalu mereka perlu membuat keputusan penting takut ke tak?

programme.title: UC 2
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri yang bahagia mula mengalami mimpi ngeri di rumah mereka apabila perbuatan ghaib dan misteri mula berlaku.

programme.title: Coming Soon
programme.desc: Seorang projeksionis muda, Chen, memutuskan untuk merakam filem seram yang baru dikeluarkan secara haram. Selepas tertidur semasa tayangan, dia terjaga dan mendapati rakan konspiratornya telah hilang dan meninggalkan kameranya. Tiba-tiba, filem seram yang mereka tonton di pawagam mula berlaku kepada mereka dalam kehidupan sebenar.

programme.title: Mercury Man
programme.desc: Selepas memberus dirinya dengan bahan pelik, rata-rata anggota bomba berubah menjadi sesuatu yang jauh lebih hebat daripada dirinya seperti Mercury Man. Dikurniakan kuasa besar yang hebat, dia kini akan menggunakan kebolehannya untuk membantu menakluki kuasa jahat.

programme.title: Petaka
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kemiskinan hidup keluarga Sham selepas kematian ayahnya. Ibunya menderita sakit kaki, manakala adiknya, Syikin tidak mampu ke sekolah kerana kekangan kewangan.

programme.title: Encounter
programme.desc: Sekumpulan rakan mendedahkan objek dunia lain di padang luar bandar yang mereka temui menyimpan rahsia yang lebih besar daripada yang mereka bayangkan.

programme.title: Khun Pan
programme.desc: Cerita ini mengisahkan tentang seorang pegawai polis bernama Khun Phan dalam Perang Dunia Kedua. Dia menjalankan misi penyamaran untuk menumpaskan seorang gabenor di sebuah pulau yang semua orang di sana dianggap penyamun.

programme.title: Zerk
programme.desc: Fatma, yang kehilangan anak perempuannya akibat lemas di tasik, selepas beberapa ketika, menyangka bahawa anak perempuannya belum meninggal dunia dan mengambil anak perempuannya dari kuburnya dan membawanya pulang. Wanita itu, yang hilang keseimbangan mental pada siang hari, membunuh diri dengan menggantung diri.

programme.title: Bohsia 2: Jalan Kembali
programme.desc: Filem ini merupakan sekuel kepada "Bohsia: Jangan Pilih Jalan Hitam" pada tahun 2009. Syamsul Yusof kembali mengarahkan kisah hidup seorang bohsia yang dilakonkan oleh Nabila Huda. Tasha (Nabila Huda) adalah seorang gadis yang dibesarkan tanpa keluarga dan pendidikan, memaksanya untuk mencari perlindungan di dunia bawah tanah, di kalangan samseng jalanan. Dia tidak lama kemudian menjadi bosan dengan kehidupannya yang tidak bermakna, tetapi jalannya menuju penebusan adalah jalan yang diturap dengan banyak halangan.

programme.title: Dendam Sarakit Ep 7 Ep7
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki dari daerah luar datang untuk membeli kebun PAK BADO. Semasa PAK BADO membawa lelaki itu pergi melawat kebunnya, mereka mengalami sesuatu yang pelik. Kawasan itu tiba-tiba menjadi gelap dan disertai dengan angin kencang. Kedengaran suara perempuan menjerit, mengilai dan meminta tolong di dalam kawasan itu. Tiba-tiba sahaja, ABANG BADO kelihatan ketakutan apabila diganggu oleh suara itu. Dia sepeti orang kurang siuman. LELAKI itu membatalkan niat mereka untuk membeli kebun ABANG BADO.

programme.title: The Invoking 4
programme.desc: Seorang wanita muda diangkut ke dimensi lain di mana roh dan syaitan mengintai. Semasa dia berjuang untuk hidupnya pada malam Halloween, dia terpaksa menghadapi ketakutannya yang paling gelap.

programme.title: Azem 3
programme.desc: Seorang isteri cemburu "zehra" meragui suaminya mempunyai hubungan sulit dengan rakannya, dia merancang untuk melaksanakan sihir hitam oleh beberapa syeikh yang jahat untuk mendapatkan suaminya kembali daripada pesaingnya. Beberapa siri peristiwa hebat mula berlaku kepada rakannya berakhir dengan pembunuhan "zehra" y suaminya untuk mengelakkan skandal curang.

programme.title: Araf 5
programme.desc: Diarahkan oleh Ugur Kaplan. Dengan Murat Ercanli, Irem Ipek, Tuggul Kucukoglu, Can Suoruc.

programme.title: UC 3
programme.desc: Kadir adalah seorang lelaki yang menjadi mangsa ilmu hitam ibunya untuk memisahkannya daripada setiap wanita, termasuk isterinya, yang akan terfikir untuk mendekatinya. Tetapi keadaan menjadi terbalik bertentangan dengan jangkaan ibunya.

programme.title: The Night Sitter
programme.desc: Seorang penipu menyamar sebagai pengasuh kanak-kanak untuk merompak rumah seorang ahli ghaib yang kaya dan anak lelakinya yang masih kecil. Tetapi apabila rakan sejenayahnya tiba, budak lelaki itu memanggil trio ahli sihir yang melayan penjahat itu ke malam kekacauan.

programme.title: Hantu Bungkus VS Pontianak
programme.desc: Sebuah filem seram komedi lakonan Osman Kering, Rosli Rahman Adam, Fetty Dzul dan Emma Akma

programme.title: The Hoarder
programme.desc: Ella dipaksa bekerja dengan sekumpulan orang asing yang menakutkan selepas terperangkap di kemudahan penyimpanan bawah tanah di mana dia mendapati dirinya diburu oleh pembunuh yang tidak dikenali.

programme.title: UC 2
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri yang bahagia mula mengalami mimpi ngeri di rumah mereka apabila perbuatan ghaib dan misteri mula berlaku.

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel dan Cynthia, pasangan muda dengan anak dalam perjalanan, mengalami masa sukar di Manila. Mereka kembali ke Baguio, tempat asal Daniel, untuk memulakan semula. Melalui kebaikan Alex, kawan Daniel zaman kanak-kanak yang kaya, mereka dapat tinggal di sebuah rumah besar, tanpa sewa; dan dia mendapat tawaran kerja juga. Segala-galanya seolah-olah jatuh pada tempatnya untuk mereka - atau begitulah yang mereka fikirkan - sehingga perkara aneh mula berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Taxi 5
programme.desc: Seorang pegawai polis yang ditukarkan dalam polis Marseilles ditugaskan untuk menumpaskan sekumpulan perompak Itali yang memandu Ferrari berkuasa bersama anak saudara Daniel yang lebih tua, seorang pemandu yang teruk yang mendapat teksi putih legenda.

programme.title: The Invoking
programme.desc: Selepas mewarisi rumah daripada keluarga yang tidak pernah dikenalinya, Samantha Harris (Trin Miller) dan tiga rakannya menuju ke Sader Ridge luar bandar untuk memeriksa harta itu. Tidak lama selepas tiba, Sam mula mengalami penglihatan mengerikan tentang kekejaman ganas dan kejahatan yang tidak terkata. Diganggu oleh kuasa jahat yang mengepungnya, Sam mengalami mimpi ngeri apabila syaitan dari masa lalunya enggan terus dikebumikan lagi.

programme.title: The Invoking 4
programme.desc: Seorang wanita muda diangkut ke dimensi lain di mana roh dan syaitan mengintai. Semasa dia berjuang untuk hidupnya pada malam Halloween, dia terpaksa menghadapi ketakutannya yang paling gelap.

programme.title: Takut Ke Tak
programme.desc: Lima pelajar jurusan filem merancang untuk melakukan penggambaran di sebuah rumah berhantu, namun satu demi satu kejadian yang sama seperti kebanyakan filem seram berlaku kepada mereka lalu mereka perlu membuat keputusan penting takut ke tak?

programme.title: Araf 5
programme.desc: Diarahkan oleh Ugur Kaplan. Dengan Murat Ercanli, Irem Ipek, Tuggul Kucukoglu, Can Suoruc.

programme.title: Dendam Sarakit Ep 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Tat dan bapanya menuju ke rumah Rafiq untuk mencari Zana. Mereka menjumpai Zana sedang bercakap seorang diri di depan rumah Rafiq. Rafiq pula mendapati bahawa Sarakit berkelakuan pelik seperti marah dengan Rafiq kerana membeli barang-barang untuk bayi dan membuat ukiran kayu untuk bayi. Sarakit meminta Rafiq berjanji untuk tidak mengalih kasih sayangnya kepada bayi yang bakal lahir tetapi hanya tertumpu pada dirinya sahaja. Pada satu malam, Tat mendapati Zana di luar rumah dengan patung kayu yang dikatakan dihadiahkan oleh wanita cantik berbaju putih. Tat tidak tahan keluarganya sering diganggu hantu tenggek dan mengesyaki Sarakit adalah puncanya. Dalam keadaan marah, Tat telah membawa parang menuju ke rumah Sarakit walaupun ditegah oleh Jali. Keesokan harinya, mayat Tat dijumpai terkulai di atas pokok.

programme.title: Foreigner
programme.desc: Kisah ahli perniagaan London yang rendah hati Quan (Chan), yang masa lalunya yang telah lama terkubur meletus dalam dendam yang didorong oleh dendam apabila satu-satunya orang yang ditinggalkan untuk dicintainya - anak perempuan remajanya - diambil daripadanya dalam tindakan keganasan bermotif politik yang tidak masuk akal . Dalam pencarian tanpa henti untuk identiti pengganas, Quan terpaksa terlibat dalam konflik kucing-dan-tikus dengan seorang pegawai kerajaan Ireland (Brosnan), yang masa lalunya mungkin mengandungi petunjuk tentang identiti pembunuh yang sukar difahami.

programme.title: Seru
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sebuah produksi yang sedang membuat satu penggambaran filem seram bertajuk "Jangan Bernafas". Semasa penggambaran berlangsung, secara tiba-tiba, pelbagai kejadian aneh dan peristiwa berlaku, diluar jangkaan mereka. Pada mulanya, mereka menganggap ia hanyalah rasukan biasa dan kru di sebalik pembikinan filem tersebut, ingin menjadikannya sebagai "footage" menarik untuk tujuan promosi filem tersebut. Namun, seorang demi seorang menjadi sasaran rasukan dan juga pembunuhan, menyebabkan keadaan menjadi tidak terkawal... tetapi kamera yang digunakan, masih terus merakamkan aksi yang terjadi.

programme.title: Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Tambun membunuh Tok Kadim, penghulu di sebuah kampung dan kemudiannya mengatakan bahawa Tok Kadim mati satu kemalangan. Selepas kejadian itu, Tambun dilantik menjadi ketua kampung yang baharu. Pada masa yang sama, Ribut, adik kepada Tambun yang berwajah hodoh ingin membalas dendam kepada Ujang kerana menolak cintanya dan memilih Seri sebagai teman. Ribut bersahabat dengan syaitan yang berjanji untuk menjadikannya seorang perempuan cantik. Sejak itulah Ribut berusaha untuk membalas dendam sehingga berlaku beberapa siri kematian yang penuh misteri.

programme.title: 2 Alam
programme.desc: Amy(Adam) melanjutkan pengajiannya di London. Semasa berada di sana, dia terpengaruh dengan budaya barat. Dia sanggup membuat pembedahan menukar jantina dan berkahwin dengan seorang lelaki Inggeris. Sekian lama membuat dosa, Amy(Adam) akhirnya nekad untuk mengambil nyawanya sendiri. Perjalanan terakhir Adam menuju liang lahad menjadi sukar dengan kejadian pelbagai peristiwa aneh.

programme.title: Brainscan: Aku Dan Topi Ajaib
programme.desc: Adruce, seorang budak yang kuat berangan dan sering tidur dalam kelas. Pada suatu hari, Adruce membawa pulang sebuah alat berbentuk topi yang dijumpainya di dalam semak. Tanpa pengetahun Adruce, alat itu adalah sebuah mesin yang boleh membaca fikiran manusia yang dicuri daripada makmal Dr. Suzana. Pelbagai kejadian berlaku selepas Adruce memakai topi itu sehingga dia perlu membetulkan semula keadaan yang telah berubah.

programme.title: Magika
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua beradik, Ayu dan Malik yang tersesat di alam bunian selepas keluar rumah pada waktu maghrib. Ayu berhadapan dengan ujian sukar untuk menyelamatkan adiknya Malik yang diculik nenek kebayan. Walau bagaimanapun, Ayu bernasib baik kerana dia bertemu dengan Badang yang membantu menyelamatkan mereka keluar dari dunia asing itu.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Datuk Pangeran Abdul Rahman, waris-warisnya dipanggil untuk mendengar wasiat yang ditulisnya. Harta peninggalannya sebanyak RM30 juta akan dibahagikan kepada Azlee, Mazlan, Saiful serta isteri mudanya, Ratana Putri, seorang wanita Thailand. Azlee tidak puas hati sebab tak mahu berkongsi harta dengan pewaris lain. Lalu berlakulah pertengkaran kecil antara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Puri. Peguam arwah Datuk Pangeran menjelaskan terdapat syarat untuk memiliki harta tersebut, iaitu kesemua waris-waris diminta untuk menetap di banglo besar itu selama 33 hari. Dalam ketegangan yangg berlaku diantara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Putri, tiba-tiba mereka dikejutkan dengan kehadiran pontianak di banglo tersebut.

programme.title: Seru
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sebuah produksi yang sedang membuat satu penggambaran filem seram bertajuk "Jangan Bernafas". Semasa penggambaran berlangsung, secara tiba-tiba, pelbagai kejadian aneh dan peristiwa berlaku, diluar jangkaan mereka. Pada mulanya, mereka menganggap ia hanyalah rasukan biasa dan kru di sebalik pembikinan filem tersebut, ingin menjadikannya sebagai "footage" menarik untuk tujuan promosi filem tersebut. Namun, seorang demi seorang menjadi sasaran rasukan dan juga pembunuhan, menyebabkan keadaan menjadi tidak terkawal... tetapi kamera yang digunakan, masih terus merakamkan aksi yang terjadi.

programme.title: Jin Notti
programme.desc: Segala yang berlaku dalam dunia jin akan bertentangan dengan alam manusia. Notti, seekor anak jin dihukum kerana sering membuat keburukan dalam dunianya. Hukuman yang dijatuhkan kepadanya ialah dia perlu turun ke bumi dan untuk bergaul dengan orang-orang jahat. Ketika berada di bumi, Notti perlu masuk ke dalam tubuh manusia dan membuat kejahatan namun dia sering gagal. Lebih merumitkan keadaan, Notti mula jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Aziz.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Datuk Pangeran Abdul Rahman, waris-warisnya dipanggil untuk mendengar wasiat yang ditulisnya. Harta peninggalannya sebanyak RM30 juta akan dibahagikan kepada Azlee, Mazlan, Saiful serta isteri mudanya, Ratana Putri, seorang wanita Thailand. Azlee tidak puas hati sebab tak mahu berkongsi harta dengan pewaris lain. Lalu berlakulah pertengkaran kecil antara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Puri. Peguam arwah Datuk Pangeran menjelaskan terdapat syarat untuk memiliki harta tersebut, iaitu kesemua waris-waris diminta untuk menetap di banglo besar itu selama 33 hari. Dalam ketegangan yangg berlaku diantara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Putri, tiba-tiba mereka dikejutkan dengan kehadiran pontianak di banglo tersebut.

programme.title: Anak Niat
programme.desc: Juita dipanggil anak niat yang ditatah penuh kasih sayang oleh ibu dan bapanya, Orang Kaya dan Faridah. Ibu dan bapa Juita bernazar kepada Keramat untuk mendapatkan seorang anak iaitu Juita namun tidak mahu menerima kenyataan bahawa perbuatan itu adalah syirik. Juita kemudian menjalinkan hubungan bersama Jidot. Abang Mat pula sedih kerana sering dipandang hina oleh Orang Kaya dan Juita hanya kerana dia seorang pembantu yang diupah oleh mereka. Kebenaran terbongkar apabila Abang Mat ialah bapa kepada Jidot dan juga Juita.

programme.title: Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Tambun membunuh Tok Kadim, penghulu di sebuah kampung dan kemudiannya mengatakan bahawa Tok Kadim mati satu kemalangan. Selepas kejadian itu, Tambun dilantik menjadi ketua kampung yang baharu. Pada masa yang sama, Ribut, adik kepada Tambun yang berwajah hodoh ingin membalas dendam kepada Ujang kerana menolak cintanya dan memilih Seri sebagai teman. Ribut bersahabat dengan syaitan yang berjanji untuk menjadikannya seorang perempuan cantik. Sejak itulah Ribut berusaha untuk membalas dendam sehingga berlaku beberapa siri kematian yang penuh misteri.

programme.title: Ular
programme.desc: Myra ialah seorang wartawan jenayah yang digantung kerja telah diarahkan untuk membuat liputan di sebuah pusat peranginan di sebuah pulau. Dia yang ditemani jurukameranya, Remy tidak pernah menyangka tugasannya kali ini bukanlah satu tugasan biasa apabila percutian hebat yang dimenangi oleh 10 orang pemenang cabutan bertuah bertukar menjadi sebuah mimpi ngeri. Segalanya bermula apabila ada di antara tetamu pusat peranginan itu dengan beraninya telah menyelinap masuk ke dalam hutan yang telah dipagari dengan pagar elektrik. Rambo yang panik setelah menyedari hal tersebut segera mendapatkan Encik Aziz, pemilik pusat peranginan tersebut. Ia secara tidak langsung telah menimbulkan rasa ingin tahu Myra dan Remy untuk merungkai apakah rahsia yang cuba disembunyikan oleh Encik Aziz di sebalik kewujudan pusat peranginan tersebut.

programme.title: Brainscan: Aku Dan Topi Ajaib
programme.desc: Adruce, seorang budak yang kuat berangan dan sering tidur dalam kelas. Pada suatu hari, Adruce membawa pulang sebuah alat berbentuk topi yang dijumpainya di dalam semak. Tanpa pengetahun Adruce, alat itu adalah sebuah mesin yang boleh membaca fikiran manusia yang dicuri daripada makmal Dr. Suzana. Pelbagai kejadian berlaku selepas Adruce memakai topi itu sehingga dia perlu membetulkan semula keadaan yang telah berubah.

programme.title: Anita Dunia Ajaib
programme.desc: Rumahtangga Amir dan Asmah berubah setelah mereka didatangi seorang pembantu rumah misteri yang membantu mendapatkan mereka cahaya mata. Selepas melahirkan anak dalam tempoh yang singkat, satu demi satu insiden aneh menimpa ahli keluarga dan kenalan mereka.

programme.title: Magika
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua beradik, Ayu dan Malik yang tersesat di alam bunian selepas keluar rumah pada waktu maghrib. Ayu berhadapan dengan ujian sukar untuk menyelamatkan adiknya Malik yang diculik nenek kebayan. Walau bagaimanapun, Ayu bernasib baik kerana dia bertemu dengan Badang yang membantu menyelamatkan mereka keluar dari dunia asing itu.

programme.title: Duhai Si Pari Pari
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Syadon, seorang pemuda yang mencintai Mala. Pada suatu hari, Syadon bertemu seorang gadis bernama Pari yang sedang mencari kekasihnya. Semakin hari, Pari semakin suntuk waktu yang Pari ada untuk mengahwini jejaka idamannya dan pulang ke dunia kayangan. Syadon bertanya siapakah Pari yang sebenarnya dan setelah diterangkan, dia sukar mempercayainya. Pari terpaksa membuktikan kata-katanya dengan menunaikan permintaan Syadon.

programme.title: Seru
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sebuah produksi yang sedang membuat satu penggambaran filem seram bertajuk "Jangan Bernafas". Semasa penggambaran berlangsung, secara tiba-tiba, pelbagai kejadian aneh dan peristiwa berlaku, diluar jangkaan mereka. Pada mulanya, mereka menganggap ia hanyalah rasukan biasa dan kru di sebalik pembikinan filem tersebut, ingin menjadikannya sebagai "footage" menarik untuk tujuan promosi filem tersebut. Namun, seorang demi seorang menjadi sasaran rasukan dan juga pembunuhan, menyebabkan keadaan menjadi tidak terkawal... tetapi kamera yang digunakan, masih terus merakamkan aksi yang terjadi.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka Puaka X gemar pergi ke beberapa tempat yang dikatakan berhantu. Mereka menggunakan pendekatan berbeza daripada kumpulan paranormal yang lain. Semakin hari, Puaka X semakin galak mencabar sesiapa di luar sana untuk membuktikan kewujudan hantu. Pada suatu hari mereka menerima cabaran daripada seseorang yang tidak dikenali untuk pergi ke lokasi bernama Balai Gombak. Tanpa disedari, ada sesuatu yang menanti mereka di sana.

programme.title: 2 Alam
programme.desc: Amy(Adam) melanjutkan pengajiannya di London. Semasa berada di sana, dia terpengaruh dengan budaya barat. Dia sanggup membuat pembedahan menukar jantina dan berkahwin dengan seorang lelaki Inggeris. Sekian lama membuat dosa, Amy(Adam) akhirnya nekad untuk mengambil nyawanya sendiri. Perjalanan terakhir Adam menuju liang lahad menjadi sukar dengan kejadian pelbagai peristiwa aneh.

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@12
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Kenyalang Badminton Talent Ep2
programme.desc: Dengan aspirasi dan inisiatif ini, kami amat berharap untuk mencari bakat-bakat pemain baru Badminton Sarawak seterusnya meningkatkan pembangunan dan perkembangan sukan Badminton di Sarawak

programme.title: PUSAKA Ep5
programme.desc: Meneroka budaya & warisan tempatan, juga mengimbau kembali kenangan zaman penjajahan dahulu serta kesannya terhadap jati diri bangsa.

programme.title: Anggun Ep6
programme.desc: Anggun is a live women talk show (10 episodes) that will be discussing current affairs and/or trending topics surrounding women empowerment, involvements and achievements.

programme.title: Life, Recycled Ep2
programme.desc: A program to encourage everyone in our community to recycle and responsibly sort waste. This program will show the entire recycling and upcycling process of plastic, paper, cooking oil, and etc.

programme.title: Halik Ep61
programme.desc: Childhood lovers Jacky and Lino meet after being apart for several years. However, now married to different people, the two must choose whether to fight to be together again or be true to the promise made to their spouses.

programme.title: Jom Camping Ep7
programme.desc: Program travelog yang meneroka pelbagai bentuk dan jenis perkhemahan berbeza selain berjalan ke lokasilokasi perkhemahan di negeri Sarawak bersama dua anak jati Sarawak, El Baharin dan Anaz Zawawi.

programme.title: Food Truck Road Trip Ep7
programme.desc: Watch the adventures of two friends, Azree & Kojak, on a journey in their Food Trucks as they drive from Miri to Kuching, making stops along the way. The duo cook dishes using locally sourced ingredients, and have misadventures as they discover new places while selling great food.

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@4:55
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Kunci Galaksi Ep2
programme.desc: A group of historians and scientists have predicted that a great artifact from another world will appear at a certain time and location. Many people believed it to be a myth and a fairy tale.

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Sukan TVS Ep7
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan, perbincangan dan topik hangat sukan tanah air

programme.title: Guru Luar Biasa Ep6
programme.desc: Guru Luar Biasa ialah sebuah dokumentari bersiri 6 episod yang akan memaparkan perkongsian pengalaman guru-guru yang pernah berkhidmat di Sarawak.

programme.title: (L) Berita Iban TVS
programme.desc: Berita Iban memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Iban

programme.title: Bario Permata Di Pergunungan Ep1
programme.desc: Pengenalan kepada bario-tanah tinggi kelabit. Kedudukannya dalam peta sarawak. Kemudahan perjalanan darat dan udara. Panorama gunung-ganang, cuaca yang nyaman (bario disebut bariew) bermaksud angin.

programme.title: (DL) Menarik Sepuluh
programme.desc: Menarik Sepuluh mengumpulkan 10 kisah unik dan menarik berlaku di mana sahaja

programme.title: (L) UTAMA
programme.desc: UTAMA merupakan segmen berita utama yang memaparkan Berita Terkini di seluruh Malaysia dan dunia.

programme.title: (L) Padah Jenayah
programme.desc: Padah Jenayah memaparkan ketangkasan pasukan keselamatan negara mengendalikan operasi,serbuan,tangkapan serta tugas-tugas menyelamat.

programme.title: Kenyalang Badminton Talent Ep3
programme.desc: Dengan aspirasi dan inisiatif ini, kami amat berharap untuk mencari bakat-bakat pemain baru Badminton Sarawak seterusnya meningkatkan pembangunan dan perkembangan sukan Badminton di Sarawak

programme.title: Borneo Wildlife & Nature Ep1
programme.desc: Breathtaking documentary that uncovers the extraordinary world of wildlife and nature, taking audiences on an unparalleled journey through one of the world's most diverse and fascinating ecosystems.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches Ep4
programme.desc: Diana Bishop, a historian and witch, forms an uneasy alliance with Matthew Clairmont, an enigmatic vampire, to decipher a manuscript containing magical secrets.

programme.title: (L) TVS Nightline
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan peristiwa yang berlaku di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa English

programme.title: Design Nation Ep13
programme.desc: Design Nation is a serial TV magazine that documents the architecture of buildings by well-renowned architects that have won various awards locally and internationally.

programme.title: Misteri Kedai Gunting Ep4
programme.desc: Kisah misteri yang dihantar oleh individu yang pernah mengalami peristiwa seram dan diceritakan semula oleh pencerita di dalam sebuah kedai gunting.

programme.title: Nature XCO & Downhill Ep11
programme.desc: Program pertandingan sukan basikal lasak yang dianjurkan oleh Broad Vision Solution Sdn.Bhd dengan kerjasama Persatuan Basikal Sarawak dan Sarawak Sports Cooperation bersama Kerajaan Negeri Sarawak.

programme.title: Suara Alam Borneo Ep9
programme.desc: Suara Alam Borneo akan mengupasnya hutan hujan tropika berusia jutaan tahun secara terperinci dengan pelbagai spesis flora dan juga fauna menerusi informasi yang mudah difahami.

programme.title: Borneo's Unique Building Ep6
programme.desc: Siri dokumentari yang memfokuskan kepada senibina bangunan dan infrastruktur di Sarawak, yang menampilkan dua binaan iaitu satu senibina moden/kontemporari dan satu lagi senibina tradisi/kolonial.

programme.title: Kedey Kita S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Orden Syam will use a food truck to visit local entrepreneurs outside Kuching city, such as Sibu, Sarikei, Sri Aman, Kapit, and Betong, helping them promote their businesses and offer exclusive promotions.

programme.title: Hope Finds Love Ep13
programme.desc: Hope, sorang penulis muda yang hiper , sering gagal dalam cinta. Namun, jodohnya sentiasa dekat dimata.

programme.title: The Cloth Story S2 Ep10
programme.desc: The Cloth Story season 2 focuses on textiles, such as Pua, Songket, Tenun, Batik and Keringkam from the Borneo region. The cloth, the raw materials, the artisans, the history, the evolution and so much more.

programme.title: Main Uti Kelia Ep6
programme.desc: Dokumentari dalam Bahasa Iban yang membawa nostalgia mengenai permainan dan aktiviti golongan remaja & dewasa kaum Iban pada zaman dahulu dan sebelum wujudnya permainan & teknologi moden seperti sekarang

programme.title: Jom Camping Ep7
programme.desc: Program travelog yang meneroka pelbagai bentuk dan jenis perkhemahan berbeza selain berjalan ke lokasilokasi perkhemahan di negeri Sarawak bersama dua anak jati Sarawak, El Baharin dan Anaz Zawawi.

programme.title: Kenyalang Badminton Talent Ep3
programme.desc: Dengan aspirasi dan inisiatif ini, kami amat berharap untuk mencari bakat-bakat pemain baru Badminton Sarawak seterusnya meningkatkan pembangunan dan perkembangan sukan Badminton di Sarawak

programme.title: Ram Ram Rep Ep1
programme.desc: A famous high school in Sarawak organises a reunion for the class of 1993. A mixed-up in the mailing of the invitations, leads to the attendance of only six ex-students.

programme.title: Take Me To Sarawak Ep1
programme.desc: This travelogue aims to take viewers, both locals and tourists, to places that you may not have heard of, but definitely have to see, experience and taste

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@7
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Life, Recycled Ep1
programme.desc: A program to encourage everyone in our community to recycle and responsibly sort waste. This program will show the entire recycling and upcycling process of plastic, paper, cooking oil, and etc.

programme.title: Journey of The Bidayuh Ep2
programme.desc: James Ritchie will take us to discover more about the Bidayuh. A documentary series that will touch on the aspects of Bidayuh culture, tradition, history and where this race fares in todays world.

programme.title: Menghilir Rajang S1 Ep9

programme.title: Country Man
programme.desc: Praew, Pelajar Ijazah Sarjana tahun lepas, dalam perjalanan pulang ke kampung halamannya di Timur Laut Thailand untuk melawat bapanya, Yong. Yong memiliki penyewa perniagaan pawagam luar dan mempunyai seorang pembantu bernama Tane, yang juga menyukai Praew sejak kecil. Dia menghabiskan masa bersama-sama dengan Tane, untuk mengelilingi wilayah Timur Laut untuk menayangkan filem itu bersama-sama. Ini membuatkan dia memahami betapa sukarnya perniagaan pawagam luar yang dihadapi bapanya, seperti perniagaan yang kurang popular di kalangan generasi baharu, penderitaan hidup penduduk tempatan dan lain-lain. Pada masa yang sama, hubungan cinta mereka berkembang dengan rasa iri hati Kaem, seorang samseng tempatan yang mengumpulkan Bayaran perlindungan untuk pemeriksaan luar. Keam juga suka Praew dari zaman kanak-kanak juga.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep71
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 33 Ep21
programme.desc: Setiap tahun, karnival SCTV mempunyai tema yang berbeza. Karnival ini menyajikan acara muzik yang paling menarik dan menampilkan ramai musikus serta selebriti terkemuka tanah air.

programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep11
programme.desc: Senja, seorang gadis yang baru sahaja memasuki sekolah barunya. Dia merupakan seorang pemain ice skating yang mahir. Namun, malangnya, suatu hari dia kalah dalam sebuah pertandingan kerana melihat sebuah anak patung Teddy Bear, yang menyebabkan dia trauma. Masa kanak-kanak Senja, di mana adiknya tenggelam dengan anak patung Teddy Bear kesayangannya, telah menyebabkan trauma padanya hingga kini. Senja akhirnya dibawa ke pakar psikiatri.

programme.title: Perjuangan Gadis Yatim Piatu Penjual Seblak Cobek Demi Kedua Adiknya
programme.desc: Saras, seorang anak yatim piatu, terpaksa berjuang untuk menyara kedua adiknya dengan menjual seblak cobek. Tambahan pula, Saras dan kedua adiknya diusir dari rumah oleh ibu tiri mereka.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep175
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep28
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep11
programme.desc: Senja, seorang gadis yang baru sahaja memasuki sekolah barunya. Dia merupakan seorang pemain ice skating yang mahir. programme.title: Hidup Lagi Cabe Cabenya Malah Dikasih Sambalado
programme.desc: Dian menjadi seorang pembantu pensyarah di kampus. Namun, Dian terpaksa berurusan dengan seorang pelajar tampan bernama Abi. Pagi itu, Dian dan Abi sedang menunggang motosikal, mengejar satu sama lain untuk cepat sampai ke kampus. Namun, ternyata mereka berdua lewat dan harus digantung selama satu semester. Dari situ, Dian kemudian bekerja separuh masa di restoran keluarga Abi. Namun, Dian berkata, 'Kamu itu dasar Madesu, Masa Depan Suram'.

programme.title: Suka Ngeri Kalo Inget Jagoan Di Hati
programme.desc: Kisah tentang pasangan muda bernama Lisa dan Yoga. Kedua-duanya datang dari keluarga yang sederhana. Yoga disukai oleh seorang gadis cantik bernama Dita, manakala Lisa disukai oleh seorang lelaki kacak, yang membuatkan Yoga cemburu beberapa kali.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep33
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep29
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama Ep2
programme.desc: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama adalah konsert besar yang menandakan ulang tahun ke-29 Indosiar, stesen televisyen Indonesia yang terkenal. Acara ini berlangsung selama dua malam. Konsert ini adalah paparan hebat bakat Indonesia, dengan persembahan dari pelbagai artis dari pelbagai genre. Acara ini dianjurkan oleh sembilan hos popular dalam industri hiburan Indonesia. Konsert ini bukan sahaja sambutan perjalanan dan pencapaian Indosiar selama hampir tiga dekad, tetapi juga mempamerkan kepelbagaian dan kekayaan budaya Indonesia.

programme.title: Prince Si Pahit Lidah
programme.desc: Selepas Prince sedar daripada koma, dia dapati tunangannya, Laras, telah berkahwin dengan sahabatnya, Fathir, yang merupakan punca kemalangan yang menimpanya. Dalam kekeliriuannya, Prince cuba memahami pengkhianatan ini, berikutan beberapa siri peristiwa yang mendedahkan tipu muslihat, penderitaan cinta, dan ancaman terhadap perkahwinan baru Laras dan Fathir.

programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: My Little Bride
programme.desc: A high school girl was forced to marry a college student by her grandfather. The effort to keep the marriage secret was soon challenged as her husband will be teaching in her school as an intern

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: The Thieves
programme.desc: Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: Lovers Vanished
programme.desc: Falsely accused of killing his wife and sentenced to life, Soo-In escaped from the prison and fall in love with bar owner Mi-Ya. Yet their love seems destined to lead to heartbreak...

programme.title: Love Guide For Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: Birthday
programme.desc: A family struggle to cope with the loss of their son in the Sewol ferry disaster. When his birthday approaches, they reminisce their memories of him.

programme.title: Tunnel
programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Oh! My Ghost
programme.desc: FD Taemin meets a female ghost who lives in the studio he works. As mysterious events happened in the studio, they join hands to investigate and protect his job and her sleeping place.

programme.title: Killing Romance
programme.desc: As a popular actress has growing discontentment towards her marriage, she begins planning to kill her rich husband with her neighbor.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Race To Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: Um Bok-dong, a cyclist who won a match during the Japanese colonial era, alerts the colonial authorities and galvanizes the locals, especially freedom fighters who have invested in the races.

programme.title: Canola
programme.desc: Gye-choon and her lost granddaughter Hye-ji reunited after 12 years, yet Hye-ji's strange behavior raise questions on what happened to her while they were apart.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Elite attorney Kang Seong-hee goes up against a top prosecutor over a case involving a man accused of killing his wife.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Watching
programme.desc: When a female workaholic is kidnapped by a security guard in the company's parking garage, she'll do whatever it takes to escape.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: Race To Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: Um Bok-dong, a cyclist who won a match during the Japanese colonial era, alerts the colonial authorities and galvanizes the locals, especially freedom fighters who have invested in the races.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Extreme Job
programme.desc: An ill-performed narcotics team takeover a fried chicken joint near the drug gang's safe house for around-the-clock surveillance. Yet their cooking talent turned the restaurant famous overnight...

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: The World of the Married Ep1
programme.desc: Ji Sun-woo, a successful doctor, is married to Lee Tae-oh, an aspiring filmmaker. Their marriage, however, starts to fall apart when Lee engages in an extra-marital affair.

programme.title: The Player 2: Master of Swindlers Ep5
programme.desc: <Player> returns with Season 2! 5 elite con artists join hands to catch lawbreakers who get away with crime by money and power.

programme.title: Steps Into Pages Ep11

programme.title: Ambassador’s Kitchen Ep1

programme.title: Maybe You Are Falling In Love Ep7

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep70
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: My Hero, My Daddy (M) Ep2021
programme.desc: A fathers love for his daughters landed Jinfa Huang in battles against other men right within his family, as he found himself in conflict with his sons-in-law. His 3 daughters each possessed a distinct personality but were similarly headstrong and in romantic relationships that caused their fathers brows to crease. Tianlan, his eldest, was in love with Minglu Xu, Jinfas superior who never missed an opportunity to make life difficult for him; Tianhong, his second daughter, was drifting apart from him because of her husband; meanwhile, his youngest girl was challenging the taboo of a campus romance. How would Jinfa emerge victor in this fight to protect the 3 loves of his life?

programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep944945
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep726
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep502
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep4142
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: This movie is the directorial debut of actor Eric Kot for Wong Kar Wai. Eric features the topic of first love in his first movie: a sleepwalker guided through the night by a lonely admirer is bizarre yet romantic, while a married grocer facing the vengeful first love that he once rejected is heartbreaking.

programme.title: A Chinese Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Young demon hunter Yan loves the fox spirit Xiao Qian but has to rid her memories of him as a human cannot love a demon. Years later, Ning meets Xiao Qian and they fall in love. Yan advises Ning to give Xiao Qian up as she is now controlled by an evil Tree Demon but he refuses. As the Tree Demon seeks revenge, Xiao Qian also starts to remember Yan.

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigator William is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, William uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brothers accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Stephen Chow returns in this hilarious and heartwarming tale of a father and son who discover an adorable alien in the trash.

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from real events. Detective Lin sets up a special unit to arrest the motorbike robber and the crime syndicate behind the thefts in Foshan. In the process, his pregnant wife is hit by a motorbike robber, leading him to uncover their revenge plan...

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Stephen Chow returns in this hilarious and heartwarming tale of a father and son who discover an adorable alien in the trash.

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various human experiments and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: Monkey King is tasked with escorting Monk Tang on his journey to the West to retrieve the scriptures. During the trip, Monk Tang is being targeted by the seductive yet deadly White Bone Spirit, who feeds on the innocents to gain immortality. Monkey King will have to fight the White Bone Spirit in order to save Monk Tang!

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppys owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kongs biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Chings wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Finger of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous Finger of Doom, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan heads son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: Killer Constable
programme.desc: Kuei Chih-hung was famous for his modern day crime thrillers, his horror flicks, and even his comedies. But if the only kung-fu film he ever made was this one, hed still be spoken of with respect by even the most ardent martial arts movie fan. Many consider this real life martial arts champion Chen Kuan-tais best performance. As a deeply, even obsessively, dedicated Chief Court Constable, he illuminates the screen with fighting skill and emotional passion. Award winning actor Ku Feng is his equal, playing an especially homicidal robber-chief who thinks nothing of throwing all his men at their relentless pursuer. Lu Tsun and Huang Pei-chi choreograph the many battles featuring such action stalwarts as Pai Piao and Ai Fei.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynastys Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho is perfectly cast as a gun-for-hire who always gets her man - in more ways than one! The cast and crew shot on location in Japanese scenic spots such as Mount Fuji; and there are plenty of over-the-top thrills, as Lily even masquerades as a nun.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: Pursuit of a Killer
programme.desc: The charm of Pursuit Of A Killer lies in the long awaited reunion of Five Venoms duo, Lo Meng and Sun Chien; Lo Meng, who plays a Mainland Chinese criminal escapee to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop (Sun Chien) who helps him adjust to Hong Kong life while tracking down his mysterious killer at the same time.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Swordsman at Large
programme.desc: Hsiao Shi Yi Lang is the Swordsman at large who everyone wants to kill. A magnificient sword is even created for this purpose though the blade is soon coveted more than the swordsman's death by it! Bandits, beauties and blade masters battle for survival in this exciting story of deceit, betrayal, and death.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: Close your eyes. Open your mind. You will be unprepared. From the Spartan slaughter of 300 to the visionary world of Watchmen, writer/director/producer Zack Snyder has transported audiences into visual dreamscapes of his creation. His latest cinematic mind trip takes us into the vivid imagination of a young girl (The Uninvited's Emily Browning) whose dream world provides the ultimate escape from her darker institutionalized reality. Unrestrained by the boundaries of time and place, she is free to go where her mind takes her, but her incredible adventures blur the lines between what's real and what is imaginary. Locked away against her will, but determined to fight for her freedom, she and four other girls battle everything from serpents tosamurais on an unbelievable journey to set themselves free. Like "Alice in Wonderland with machine guns," Snyder's epic action fantasy is filmed in such a way that the action sequences aren't limited by physical real...

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S4 Ep8
programme.desc: A Tale of Three Bakers - The home bakers are tasked with telling their baking story through four delectable dessert chapters; one baker walks away with the $50,000 grand prize and the title of Great Chocolate Showdown Champion.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Let The Games Begin! - Ten home bakers enter the kitchen and are tasked with creating a chocolate Tic Tac Toe board. In the Elimination Challenge, the bakers set a scrumptious scene by delivering a cake diorama.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Think Outside the Bar - The remaining nine bakers must think beyond the bar as they create a nougat-filled chocolate confection in a surprising shape; the bakers aim to please in the elimination challenge with a dessert that pairs chocolate with cheese.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Pie Society - Eight home bakers must make pies with a decorative crust; the bakers flex their flavour muscles in the elimination challenge by creating a dessert that showcases one of the major taste sensations.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Best Fruit Forward - The home bakers bejewel a chocolate sculpture; the bakers create an appealing entremets that replicates a piece of fruit.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S4 Ep5
programme.desc: World of Flavor - With the immunity off the table, the top six bakers pair up to build a magnificent meringue tower; after receiving a postcard from home, the bakers embark on a sweet journey and deliver a dessert showcasing an international ingredient.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S4 Ep6

programme.desc: With the worlds smartest, bravest, and most highly trained women all over the globe, there are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: When his young daughter goes missing and is perceived kidnapped, a worried father takes matters into his own hands and captures the lead suspect, holding him hostage and gradually resorting to torture in a bid to learn the truth.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: Shanghai
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as an American intelligence official who returns to Shanghai in late 1941 to investigate the death of a friend, which leads him to both love and a much larger conspiracy.

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: A handsome musician-turned-gunslinger returns to a small Mexican town seeking revenge against an evil drug kingpin.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: Clive Owen and Naomi Watts star in an adrenaline-pumping, action-packed thrill ride about a man determined to deliver justice to a corrupt international arms-dealing ringthat funds worldwide genocide and terrorism...no matter the cost!

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: A female paleontologist from New York City heads to Maine where local fish and game officials have discovered a gigantic and deadly 30-foot crocodile that appears to be living in one of the local .akes.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson has been framed for a fire on The Pearl. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building...above the fire line.

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: Matt Dillon, Idris Elba, Paul Walker and Hayden Christiansen star in this action-packed thriller full of twists and turns.

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Hunted by a ruthless agent and an army of corrupt cops working for a deadly drug kingpin, Toretto and OConner reunite the gang to pull off one last job - an insane heist worth $100 million!

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: When a Russian Military Convoy is taken down in Moscow, Agent Hobbs goes to the only man who can help him find his target Dominic Toretto.

programme.title: Shanghai
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as an American intelligence official who returns to Shanghai in late 1941 to investigate the death of a friend, which leads him to both love and a much larger conspiracy.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of friends break into the house of a wealthy blind man, thinking they'll get away with the perfect heist. They're wrong.
