programme.desc: Milan - Stanley visits Milan, the capital of Lombardy. He goes for aperitivo with a social media star and tries some of the Missoni family's favourite dishes: brasato, polenta and freshly foraged mushrooms.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Discover why a hot house is essential to growing the sweetest tomatoes; how a 130 foot tunnel oven makes perfect muffins; the secret recipe for Breathsavers candy; and how today's machines can make the best gnocchi in only ten minutes!

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Discover how 32,000 delectably nutritious bagels are made in eight hours; how one company mass produces lip-smackin' airplane food always ready for take off; why berries are essential to make perfecly crunchy Sun Chips.

programme.title: Lion: The Rise and Fall of the Marsh Pride S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The story of the Marsh Pride continues with testimony from those who filmed them, those who tried to protect them and those who hunted them. The Maasai, who live and graze their cattle next door to the pride speak about the struggles of living close to these dangerous predators.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Headphones - Headphones: these marvels of miniaturisation are worn by 30 million people in the UK. Hannah Fry visits Bose to find out how the teeny earbud tech works and meets the human testers with 'golden ears'.

programme.desc: In the final leg of his journey Alexander visits Busan, a coastal port and South Korea's second biggest city. He takes in a visit to a shaman, and climbs up Sunrise Peak, a UNESCO world heritage site.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Milan - Stanley visits Milan, the capital of Lombardy. He goes for aperitivo with a social media star and tries some of the Missoni family's favourite dishes: brasato, polenta and freshly foraged mushrooms.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S8 Ep3
programme.desc: Jeans - Gregg Wallace visits two factories in Italy and Wales to explore the fascinating secrets behind how Welsh jeans brand Hiut make their trousers. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey visits a zip factory to learn how the ubiquitous fastener is made.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Bulgaria - Ben Fogle returns to Bulgaria to meet up with nomads Miriam and Peter after four years.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep3

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hong Kong - Michael begins his adventures in Hong Kong, with railway highlights including the cable funicular to the top of Hong Kong's highest mountain, the Peak, and the enviably efficient and shiny Mass Transit System.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Duckling Dramas Ep5
programme.desc: Deal with duelling duckling roundups and find out if vet Karina calls in specialists to treat koala Spikes leg fracture. Get to the bottom of stomach issues plaguing baby echidnas Ping and Pong, and meet koala Jarrah, who seems to have lost his way.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mother's Darlings Ep2
programme.desc: Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 - Bazaruto Shallows Ep5
programme.desc: Off the coast of Mozambique, warm water surrounds idyllic islands. In this shallow realm, sunlight fuels abundant growth. Rich sea currents carry food and inundate underwater meadows. Life in many forms crowds the space between seabed and surface.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - The Next Generation Ep3
programme.desc: Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the oceans most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Gutsy Koala Ep3
programme.desc: Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Relentless Sun Ep7
programme.desc: A once-in-a-generation drought has sucked all the moisture from surrounding rivers and the conservation team is struggling to keep up with the swath of thirsty creatures. While some animals succumb to dehydration, the team must concentrate its efforts on a particularly vulnerable - and dangerous - water buffalo.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 - Gutsy Koala Ep3
programme.desc: Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - The More the Merrier Ep3
programme.desc: Watch fur seals give birth by the thousands, black bear cubs wrestle with their buddies, and meerkat pups forge bonds by sharing choresall proving that growing up in the animal kingdom is easier when you have numbers on your side.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Bush Camps Ep8
programme.desc: Eco-tourism isn't just a background player in the operation of Ol Pejeta, it's the financial backbone that keeps the park operating. From comfortable camping to ultra-luxurious accommodation, the guests that stay at Ol Pejeta live among nature during their stay and they even assist in research and tracking park wildlife.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Addo Elephant Ep1
programme.desc: The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. While the elephants are the stars of the park, Addo is the only reserve in the world where visitors can see all of the big seven: lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, white rhino, southern right whale, and great white shark.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Table Mountain Ep2
programme.desc: Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - iSimangoliso Ep3
programme.desc: In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as the Miracle, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Karoo Ep4
programme.desc: In the center of South Africa is an ancient landscape that was once an inland sea. Now its a mosaic of unique habitats. Life here has evolved ingenious solutions to survive. There is nowhere in South Africa quite like the Karoo National Park.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Cool South Ep2
programme.desc: Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Wild West Ep3
programme.desc: Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands 1 - The Wilds of Winter Ep1
programme.desc: Endure winter and early spring on the west coast, where animals eke out a chilly existence. Watch red deer battle on windswept Inishvickillane, welcome seal pups amid howling storms on the Inishkea islands, and view the return of the basking sharks.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands 1 - Summer on the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Explore a 1,500-year-old monastery among the dizzying crags of the world-famous Skellig Islands. Spy Manx shearwaters and humpback whales, then chase after pygmy shrews on Clare before heading to the Aran Islands for a peek at an autumn spectacle.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Tidelands Ep4
programme.desc: Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - The More the Merrier Ep3
programme.desc: Watch fur seals give birth by the thousands, black bear cubs wrestle with their buddies, and meerkat pups forge bonds by sharing choresall proving that growing up in the animal kingdom is easier when you have numbers on your side.

programme.desc: Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - iSimangoliso Ep3
programme.desc: In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as the Miracle, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Cool South Ep2
programme.desc: Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Super Powers Ep2
programme.desc: See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands 1 - The Wilds of Winter Ep1
programme.desc: Endure winter and early spring on the west coast, where animals eke out a chilly existence. Watch red deer battle on windswept Inishvickillane, welcome seal pups amid howling storms on the Inishkea islands, and view the return of the basking sharks.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands 1 - Summer on the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Explore a 1,500-year-old monastery among the dizzying crags of the world-famous Skellig Islands. Spy Manx shearwaters and humpback whales, then chase after pygmy shrews on Clare before heading to the Aran Islands for a peek at an autumn spectacle.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Tidelands Ep4
programme.desc: Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Karoo Ep4
programme.desc: In the center of South Africa is an ancient landscape that was once an inland sea. Now its a mosaic of unique habitats. Life here has evolved ingenious solutions to survive. There is nowhere in South Africa quite like the Karoo National Park.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Bush Camps Ep8
programme.desc: Eco-tourism isn't just a background player in the operation of Ol Pejeta, it's the financial backbone that keeps the park operating. From comfortable camping to ultra-luxurious accommodation, the guests that stay at Ol Pejeta live among nature during their stay and they even assist in research and tracking park wildlife.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Cool South Ep2
programme.desc: Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Wild West Ep3
programme.desc: Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands 1 - The Wilds of Winter Ep1
programme.desc: Endure winter and early spring on the west coast, where animals eke out a chilly existence. Watch red deer battle on windswept Inishvickillane, welcome seal pups amid howling storms on the Inishkea islands, and view the return of the basking sharks.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands 1 - Summer on the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Explore a 1,500-year-old monastery among the dizzying crags of the world-famous Skellig Islands. Spy Manx shearwaters and humpback whales, then chase after pygmy shrews on Clare before heading to the Aran Islands for a peek at an autumn spectacle.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Tidelands Ep4
programme.desc: Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Fresh Meat Ep4
programme.desc: Infancy isnt all fun and games. Some animals must hit the ground running to avoid becoming dinner for predators. Take an in-depth look at what life is like for newborn animals that must learn fast your die young.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Girls of Oryx Plain Ep9
programme.desc: A baby rhino's mother is illegally shot and Ol Pejeta staff have to calm the wild baby. It's not ideal to separate the calf from her mother, but the situation is dire, and the calf will have to be hand-raised. Also, a look at a four-year-old captive rhino that went through the same thing and is now entering a new stage in life.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 - Fires of Don Goyo Ep2
programme.desc: Volcanic folklore is reflected in Mexican history. One of their ancient legends tells the story of the Aztec warrior Popocatpetl - a giant active volcano - who erupts to wake his sleeping princess Iztacchuatl, a neighbouring extinct ice capped volcano.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 - A Place Like Hell Ep3
programme.desc: In Indonesia we find regions where the air is so toxic that its 40 times above human safe levels and sulphuric acid vents from the ground in dense yellowish clouds. Elsewhere, small volcanoes are so active, they are said to erupt every 15 minutes!

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 - Restless Giants Ep4
programme.desc: Japan is going through a seismic crisis after the devastating Tsunami of 2011. We look closely at two very dangerous volcanoes; both are considered to be in the top five most dangerous on the planet.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 - In the Path of a Volcano Ep5
programme.desc: For people who live on active volcanoes, life has an element of impermanence to it. There is always the fear that one day their turn will come, and their home will be in the path of the volcano.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Snares Islands/ Tini Heke Ep1
programme.desc: Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko Ep2
programme.desc: Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu Ep3
programme.desc: Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealands South Island, where one of the worlds longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi Ep4
programme.desc: Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Three Kings Islands/ Manawatāwhi Ep5
programme.desc: Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Cook Islands/ Kūki 'Airani Ep6
programme.desc: Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Fresh Meat Ep4
programme.desc: Infancy isnt all fun and games. Some animals must hit the ground running to avoid becoming dinner for predators. Take an in-depth look at what life is like for newborn animals that must learn fast your die young.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver S1 Ep1
programme.desc: From home cooks and professional chefs, to Instagrammers and those who just love cooking for their family and friends, the first six cooks pitch their book ideas and their dishes to the judges.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S5 Ep8
programme.desc: Hotel Hubertus, Italy - Christmas Special - In the Alpine Tyrol region of Northern Italy lies Hotel Hubertus - a family run resort which offers spectacular views of the surrounding mountains thanks to its extraordinary architecture. Rob and Monica discover the unique Heaven and Hell spa, local ski experiences and are welcomed into the family behind the vision.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Kerie's Hut and Pigsties - Simon and the gang travel to Hampshire to join Kerie and Dave on their land on the border of the South Downs National Park. Nestled in this beautiful woodland lies an old shepherds hut and pigsty which Kerie and Dave dream of renovating in to a B&B business.

programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep10
programme.desc: Finale - The top three bakers battle it out to be crowned South Africa's Best Amateur Baker. For their final signature bake, Siba and Paul request 24 glazed petit fours, which highlight distinct South African flavours. The technical challenge comes with a twist that takes the bakers by surprise, and for their last challenge of the season, bakers have 5 hours to create a large sculpture - the final chance to impress the judges enough to claim the title.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep8
programme.desc: Clucky Day \ Take Me Out to the Fetch Game - Scooch is bummed out because hes missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When theres a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, its up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they dont have to forfeit.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8
programme.desc: The Case Of Jumpy Revs - Something very strange is happening in Toyland. Lots of things seem to be jumping in a particular direction for no reason Revs, Noddy's bell, Big Ear's spoons and kettle. What is going on? Noddy decides to investigate and help his best friend Revs who is very upset. Using his investigating kit and the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that everything that is jumping is metal! He follows the trail, together with bravely jumpy Revs, to DareDale's Pirate Bay where they find the Pirates on a treasure hunt with a big electronic magnet! Brave Noddy has to jump aboard the wildly careening galleon and turn off the magnet before disaster strikes. Well-done Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep8
programme.desc: Topsy's Musical Stones - Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep2
programme.desc: A Day in Turkey - Wally and Wenda go to Turkey to find a sleeping rug for Arf. They meet a fellow Wanderer, Yasemin, and realize that their Turkish rug is actually a map to the Doubling Key! Odlulu and Fritz find the key first and cause chaos as the W's try to escape from the underground Cistern.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep30
programme.desc: Disappearing Act/Sting Of Justice - When a bad magic trick makes Chet disappear, Turbo and Burn work together to find him; A superhero hornet arrives in Turbotown and stirs up trouble.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep30
programme.desc: Wings - Ton-Ton's dreams come true when the Trux build hang-gliding wings to rescue the Ottos, but when he crashes it's up to Dozer to fly the rescue mission

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep30
programme.desc: Chercophonie / Oh, Man, And The Sea - Tip becomes a Boovsland rock icon due to her awful guitar playing; When Donny takes Oh fishing, they battle a giant Sturgeon

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep19
programme.desc: Lucky And The Golden Opportunity - When the PALs find gold, things spiral out of control until Lucky and Spirit have to rescue their friends from the bottom of a mine!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep20
programme.desc: Lucky And The Lion - When a mountain lion is spotted in Miradero, no one is safe!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep11
programme.desc: Friday Night Liyotes - When Grug won't let her join his winning team, Eep forms her own underdog team in the first-ever sports competition Ahhh! Valley's annual Egg Toss.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much / Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep18
programme.desc: The Beast - Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep19
programme.desc: An Uphill Battle - The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep30
programme.desc: Turn And Burn - Stoick, Hiccup and Snotlout search for Spitelout when he goes missing, and ultimately find him on a distant island battling a fiery Singetail dragon.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep30
programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren't Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep43
programme.desc: OCB - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep18
programme.desc: The Beast - Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep19
programme.desc: An Uphill Battle - The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep45
programme.desc: Written By - When Dulcinea searches for clues on the Crown of Souls, she finds the author of the Wee Compendium book and holds him hostage until she gets answers

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep45
programme.desc: Dire Straits - Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berk's trade.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep45
programme.desc: Bad Luck Branch/ Gem Day - Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branchs Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique Gem), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branchs gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep45
programme.desc: The Good Book - Julien hires Croc Ambassador, an etiquette expert, to teach the kingdom how to behave at a classy ball, but everyone is too uptight to party

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep19
programme.desc: The Ark Of Taujee - The team sets off to rescue the people of the dying lava planet of Tajueer

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep45
programme.desc: Tunnel Of Terror / Creature From The Croods Lagoon - Eep, Thunk, Lerk, and Womp set out to make it to the end of The Tunnel of Terror within the Cave of Secrets; After being rescued by a mysterious creature at the watering hole, Thunk tries to convince the Valley that a sea thing exists and it's not just his imagination

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep19
programme.desc: Lucky And The Golden Opportunity - When the PALs find gold, things spiral out of control until Lucky and Spirit have to rescue their friends from the bottom of a mine!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep19
programme.desc: Mall Is Well / Taco Tank - Turbo competes in a crazy underground race through a mall.//Tito trades in his food truck for a tank and goes on a wild ride through the city.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep71
programme.desc: Slugsy's Song - Slugsy has found something really special. Only Primrose can be persuaded to go and see it with him. Even she is surprised by what she sees!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep19
programme.desc: The Case Of Bling's Hidden Present - It's Bling's birthday and she is so excited that she keeps opening all her presents before her party. Noddy needs to make sure she doesn't open the storybook present from him and Big Ears early but he's got to find it first! Big Ears has hidden it and can't remember where he's put it! Noddy launches his investigation to find the missing present before Bling does. Using his investigating skills Noddy follows the clues all over Toyland to find the present before the impatient little Naughticorn. At her birthday party Bling is thrilled to open the present from Noddy and Big Ears. She does have a present to open at her party after all! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Secret Deliveries - Someone is giving presents to everyone in Toyland and all the toys want to say thank you but no one knows the identity of the secret gift giver! It's up to Noddy to investigate and find out who is it that's leaving presents for all the friends. By following clues and using his investigation skills, Noddy follows the trail to Animal Acres and discovers that Pat Pat and the Pockets are the secret gift-givers. Kind Noddy has a great idea and when Pat Pat makes her final delivery she finds a big pile of presents waiting for her from all her grateful friends. Thank you Pat Pat! And thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep11
programme.desc: Cici Spectacular - Mr Carburettor has asked CiCi to perform one of her stunts in front of a big crowd. CiCi is very nervous and Roary does his best to help his friend prepare for the event.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep12
programme.desc: Cry Cold - Big Chris is feeling ill so Marsha sends him to bed until he is better. Big Chris enjoys the attention rather too much and fails to let everyone know when he is on the mend.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep11
programme.desc: Why Frog Croaks - You see there was a time when Frog didn't croak. Frog sang like a bird and the birds didn't like it. Birds were the masters of song and that's the way it should be! So the birds trick poor old Frog into a singing duel and sing and sing and sing until poor old Frog's voice is reduced to a rebbit. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep12
programme.desc: Why Spider Has A Tiny Waist - You see there was a time when Spider didn't have a tiny waist. She was all big and round and did she like her food! One day greedy Spider hears of Four Feasts in Tinga Tinga and she wanted to go to them all! So she spun four threads and attached them to various animals going to the feasts. But the Monkeys, Frog, Hippo and the Bees all set off in different directions North, South, East and West and Spider's thread soon runs out. EEeeek! The threads get tighter and tighter and tighter, making Spider's smaller and smaller and smaller! Luckily the threads break, but from that day on Spider has always had a tiny waist. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep5
programme.desc: Spinny Water / Kelp's Song - Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep13
programme.desc: The Glitter Guide / Piano Panic - When the Dews find out their glitter guide (an older Dew Drop) is coming to visit, they bend over backwards to make a great first impression, but end up forgetting some of their responsiblities in the process. / When a string breaks on Marcus piano before his recital and he cant practice, the Dews must lead Marcus to a new piano.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep25
programme.desc: Peril Patch / Sibling Quibbling - When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep26
programme.desc: Musical Thrones / Branch Bum - Poppy hosts the biggest contest of the year for the chance to with a cool new hug watch/The Snack Pack go on a Caterbus road-trip and get sucked into a wormhole

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep25
programme.desc: The Phantom Of Club Moist - King Julien finally realize his childhood dream of opening up a nightclub, only to find it's haunted by a masked phantom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep26
programme.desc: King Juli-End - King Julien is mistakenly diagnosed with Mad Horse Disease, leading him to believe he's going to die and Uncle King Julien to try to reclaim the throne.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep27
programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroups other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep45
programme.desc: Dire Straits - Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berk's trade.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep46
programme.desc: The Longest Day - During the week of the Midnight Sun where the sun doesn't set for a week, Hiccup must deal with sleep deprivation and a dangerous new dragon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep25
programme.desc: Si - Puss fights the Duchess to retrieve the first coin he ever took from the Treasure House, which can help him restore San Lorenzo's protective spell.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep26
programme.desc: No - Puss in Boots returns to San Lorenzo at the behest of Dulcinea, to flush out an imposter masquerading as the town's protector.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep27
programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroups other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep3
programme.desc: Vienna Voice-Versa - When Whitebeard attempts to magically enhance his voice for a singing duet with an old Wizard friend, he accidentally switches bodies with Arf. Now, with Dog-Whitebeard stalling the show, it's up to Wally and Wenda to reverse the mix-up before the concert.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep31
programme.desc: Treasure Of The Sierra Marty/Big Baby - Chet, Skidmark and Smoove Move bring swamp toad Marty on an adventure; The snails fumble taking care of a lost human child left at the taco stand.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep31
programme.desc: Slamtools - Garby and Click-Clack must rescue the Dinotruxafter they are tied down by a destructive tribe of Slamtools who made an evil deal with D-Structs

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep31
programme.desc: Hard To Gettings / Tummy Fish - After Oh goes on a date with Sharzod, she wants to be in a serious relationship; When the parasites who live in Oh's tummy emerge, Tip is surprised to discover that she is a celebrity to them.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep21
programme.desc: Lucky And The Impatient Patient - While Spirit recovers from his injuries, Lucky helps out at the soda shop.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep22
programme.desc: Lucky And The Train Tycoon - While Lucky is eager to celebrate her first birthday on the frontier, a surprise visit from her Grandpa stirs up a controversy.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep13
programme.desc: Unsolved Mystereep - When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep14
programme.desc: Gran The Unfriendly Ghost / Bad Sandy - Gran is sick of the Croods not listening to her advice and fakes her own death. But, when the Croods don't mourn to her liking, she haunts them/Ahhh! Valley threatens to exile Sandy after a string of bad behavior unless the Croods can get her under control

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep26
programme.desc: The Invincible Armour - Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep31
programme.desc: Buffalord Soldier - Astrid comes down with the Odin's Revenge flu and the Riders must search for the cure by finding a nearly extinct Buffalord dragon before Viggo does.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep31
programme.desc: Love Gauntlet - King Julien tries to get rid of his parents, but when evil Karl traps them in the Love Gauntlet they must prove their family's strength to survive.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: On the coast of Malaysia's Penang Island, a plan to construct large artificial islands may threaten the livelihoods of local fishermen, who have lived in harmony with the ecosystem for generations.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline Biz
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Bento Expo
programme.desc: Marc demonstrates how to make an okonomiyaki bento and Maki introduces a simple and delicious mayo-yaki chicken bento. Bento Trip travels to Indonesia, where character bento have become all the rage.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Gardener Yamashita Rikito collects plants with nowhere to go, that must be removed for demolition or renovation, and finds them new homes; saving them while saving those who give them up from regret.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: Chatroom Japan puts a spotlight on our diverse international community.We report on the issues, speak to those involved, and get a fresh look at what it's like to live in Japan.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Mt. Fuji'S Faces
programme.desc: We observe "Red Fuji" and "Black Fuji," 2 dramatically different views of Japan's most famous mountain, captured by the artist Hokusai. What did Mount Fuji mean to the people of Edo?

programme.title: Kaizoku: Noshima Island
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Noshima Island.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: For hundreds of years, Japanese people have used name stamps, known as hanko, to sign their name. In a 5-minute digest, we discover their history and explore what a hanko-free future might look like.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Fukinoto signals the coming of spring. Shaped like a lovely bouquet, the mountain veggie offers a stimulating bitterness that people wait all year to enjoy.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Poet Of The Piano Fuzjko Hemming
programme.desc: Fuzjko Hemming, now in her 90s, is celebrated globally as a pianist of the soul. We follow her on her journey to Mallorca, where she delves into the world of Chopin, her artist hero.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: A Museum Of Memories
programme.desc: The surviving curator of a museum, damaged in the March 2011 earthquake, unearths and restores over 400,000 displays from the debris. When the museum reopens, another miracle awaits.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
programme.desc: Taimatsu Akashi honors those who died defending the castle in Sukagawa in 1589. Local people form teams to make huge torches that are set alight in a hilltop park to commemorate the fallen warriors.

programme.title: Japan Sportscope
programme.desc: This time, Harry's challenge is "Parkour," born from French military training. To enjoy parkour, you have to use your body and your brain. We also show the instructor's mind-boggling skills!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Travel Iwate Pref. from popular destination Morioka to the Pacific coast. Eat your fill of soba noodles, dive into in a fantastical world, fish with cucumbers, and go spelunking.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at soba restaurants. As a quick meal, or part of a New Year's tradition, soba is an iconic Japanese dish.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NHK World-Japan Special Program
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a wide range of programs from news, current affairs, documentaries, etc. focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: Rockie And Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: Take Tech
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Yokai
programme.desc: In Ehime Prefecture, a Yokai called the Ushioni, with the body of a bull and the face of an ogre, is now revered as a local guardian, despite once being regarded as a terrifying man-eating beast.

programme.title: Cinematic Journey
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: In summer, children gather at the street corners where Jizo statues stand for lively festivities. People pray for the health and success of their children during this cornerstone of faith.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions (28 Min.)
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: lithium-ion batteries & dust collectors.

programme.title: Bosai
programme.desc: Droughts are increasing and simulations predict that megadroughts could occur in the future. Discover Japan's technology that could solve water scarcity.

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking that we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "It Cant't Be Done!"...

Center will be one to remember, as middleweight contenders Jared Cannonier and Nassourdine Imavov clash in a bout expected to shake up the 185-pound Top 10.
